title: CloudSlang content
content:
This topic describes CloudSlang content development using Maven Artifacts.

System requirements

  • Java 1.8 
  • Maven 3.3.9 
  • Java IDE (optionally, you may want to install a Java IDE with Maven support, like Eclipse or IntelliJ) 
  • Python IDE (optionally, you may want to install a Python IDE like PyCharm or Eclipse) 

Prerequisites

Developing new actions requires Java or Python knowledge. In addition, to develop CloudSlang Content make sure to: 

  • install Maven for resolving dependencies and building the project. 
  • read the Maven getting started guide 
  • check the CloudSlang tutorial
